attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BAN PRIVATE SECTOR HELICOPTER FLIGHTS,(ESPECIALLY RECREATIONAL)   
They are simply far too disruptively noisy & serve the privledged few at the expense of the general populaton.
They must be a gross waste of fuel & unecessarily polluting.
This must stop & if not, easy access to flight information (in retrospect will suffice) to expose those who are really just as inconsiderate & antisocial as those automobile high power stereo freaks who pollute our streets.
